name: Tauri Latgale: Lost In The Woods
name_original: Tauri Latgale: Lost In The Woods
description:
Once upon a time, there was a young red hooded girl called Tauri Latgale.

One day, she was wandering around the woods collecting berries and other sort of remedies, but fate has another plan for her. She was ambushed by multiple fierce creatures trying to devour her, thankfully she brought her bow and arrow with her, allowing her to defeat the creatures in those woods. 

Will she be able to make it out alive? Or will she be devoured by the creatures in the night? 

Tauri Latgale: Lost In The Woods is an endless RNG turn-based game where you control a dice in order to defeat your enemies. You will play as Tauri Latgale as you try to defeat the countless waves of enemy in your path. Will you depend on your luck or will you try to use your reflex to stop the dice as you see fit? See how long you can survive in this endless turn-based game!

HOW TO PLAY: Stop the Dice  : Space bar or click the dice
Click & Hover : Mouse CREDITS

Christopher Fendika Lee - Game Designer and Programmer

Ferry - Game 2D Artist

Dheanandri - Game 2D Artist

Lauretta Gail Rosalind Wijaya - Game Sound Artist and UI Designer

Christopher Vincent W. - Music Composer and Game Sound Artist
